data.title: GalenMedical
data.text:
Men’s Health Month

June is Men’s Health Month, and the team at Galen is celebrating the health and wellness of our male patients and their families...

COVID-19 Testing Update

Due to an increase in COVID-19 testing, we will not be administering COVID-19 tests for vacation travel.

If you believe you are exhibiting COVID-19 symptoms and need to be tested please call our COVID-19 hotline at 423‑618‑9006.

Jennifer D. Mercer, DNP, CNM

Galen OB/GYN specializes in the medical and surgical care of the female reproductive system and associated disorders for woman of all ages. We take a compassionates and responsive approach to obstetric and gynecological care from adolescence through childbirth and beyond.

To learn more about this practice click below.

Christopher Lowe, M.D.

At Galen Dermatology we specialize in the treating diseases of the skin, hair, and nails. Our dermatologists are experts in the diagnosis and treatment of a wide variety of skin disorders and possess training in various procedures, such as dermatologic surgery, cosmetic surgery, and cosmetic procedures.

To learn more about this practice click below.

Asma S.Khan, M.D.

The Center for Diabetes and Endocrinology at Galen is devoted to the management of metabolic disorders and other hormonal problems. Our practice helps individuals manage their goals by using a comprehensive approach, individualized education and the latest technology to provide endocrine management adapted to your lifestyle.

To learn more about this practice click below.

Susan Gouge, D.O.

At Galen Mountain View Medicine, formerly Mountain View Medicine, care is at the core of what we do. Our practice is committed to providing your family. Located on Apison Pike in Ooltewah, TN our providers, like Susan Gouge, D.O. deliver your healthcare with the highest level of passion and medical expertise.

To learn more about this practice click below.

Elizabeth Close,

MD

Elizabeth (Betsy) Close, MD, FAAFP, DABOM is a specialist in Family Medicine at Galen. Originally from Signal Mountain, Tennessee, she went on attend the University of Tennessee at Knoxville for undergrad. Dr. Close was a clinical faculty member at UT College of Medicine from 2010-2015, the Department of Family Medicine Assistant Professor from 2015-2019, and the Associate Professor from 2019-2014. .

To learn more about this practice click below.

Katelyn Anderson,

MSN, FNP-BC

Katelyn Anderson, MSN, FNP-BC is from Cleveland, Tennessee, and attended Walker Valley High School. She graduated from Lincoln Memorial University with her BSN and from the University of Tennessee Knoxville with her MSN FP. Katelyn has been in practice since 2018 and has a passion for helping others, both mentally and physically. She loves building relationships with her patients and being part of their healing journey.

To learn more about this practice click below.

Destiny Smith,

CNM

Destiny Smith, CNM is a certified Nurse Midwife Specialist at Galen OBGYN. Originally from North Carolina, she attended Frontier Nursing University in Hyden, Kentucky then completed her training in St. Augustine, FL. Destiny chose a specialty in Midwifery because it encompassed her values. She enjoys watching her patients become mothers for the first time and helping them through their pregnancy journey.

To learn more about this practice click below.

Caroline Gawthrop, MSN, FNP-C

Caroline is a family nurse practitioner at The Allergy and Asthma Group of Galen. She grew up in the Chattanooga area and graduated high school from Chattanooga Christian School. She attended the University of Georgia for undergrad, the Medical College of Georgia for nursing school, and then Samford University for Nurse Practitioner school. Caroline decided to pursue medicine because she enjoys helping others.

To learn more about this practice click below.

Isabel Warren,

PA

Isabel Warren is a board-certified Physician Assistant at Galen Dermatology. She grew up in the Greater Chattanooga area and graduated high school from Boyd Buchanan. She graduated Summa Cum Laude from the University of Tennessee at Knoxville with a bachelor’s in kinesiology. She then received her master’s degree in Physician Assistant Studies from Lincoln Memorial University in Knoxville, Tennessee.

To learn more about this practice click below.
